generatedPrompts.frontCover:
**Front Cover Prompt:**

A watercolor birthday greeting card front cover, funny and heartwarming, depicting a chaotic and joyful family celebration scene. In the center, "Happy Birthday Sarah & Mike!" is written in a beautiful, flowing, handwritten cursive script.

Create flat 2D cartoon-illustrated characters of the specific people from the attached reference photo, capturing their unique features, hairstyles, and clothing. The scene is set in a cozy living room, rendered in a soft, flowing watercolor style with visible paper texture, artistic brush strokes, and organic paint bleeds.

The family is mid-action: Dad is comically struggling to light too many candles on a slightly lopsided birthday cake, a puff of smoke humorously rising. Mom is laughing heartily, holding a camera attempting to take a photo but shaking with laughter. Sarah is playfully trying to sneak a bit of frosting from the cake while Mike is mid-cheer, arms in the air, wearing a ridiculously small party hat. The family dog is at their feet, tail wagging, with a party blower in its mouth. The overall atmosphere is lighthearted, full of movement, and captures a genuine, warm family moment. The background is loosely painted with soft washes of color, suggesting a festive room with a few stray balloons and confetti floating around. The color palette is bright and cheerful.
generatedPrompts.backCover:
Create a very minimal back cover for a greeting card. Extract ONLY the color palette and artistic style from this description BUT create a much simpler design: "**Front Cover Prompt:**

A watercolor birthday greeting card front cover, funny and heartwarming, depicting a chaotic and joyful family celebration scene. In the center, "Happy Birthday Sarah & Mike!" is written in a beautiful, flowing, handwritten cursive script.

Create flat 2D cartoon-illustrated characters of the specific people from the attached reference photo, capturing their unique features, hairstyles, and clothing. The scene is set in a cozy living room, rendered in a soft, flowing watercolor style with visible paper texture, artistic brush strokes, and organic paint bleeds.

The family is mid-action: Dad is comically struggling to light too many candles on a slightly lopsided birthday cake, a puff of smoke humorously rising. Mom is laughing heartily, holding a camera attempting to take a photo but shaking with laughter. Sarah is playfully trying to sneak a bit of frosting from the cake while Mike is mid-cheer, arms in the air, wearing a ridiculously small party hat. The family dog is at their feet, tail wagging, with a party blower in its mouth. The overall atmosphere is lighthearted, full of movement, and captures a genuine, warm family moment. The background is loosely painted with soft washes of color, suggesting a festive room with a few stray balloons and confetti floating around. The color palette is bright and cheerful.". 
    
Use only 20% visual density - perhaps a single small element, subtle corner detail, or soft color gradient. Most of the back should be clean, peaceful space. Think elegant minimalism. IMPORTANT: DO NOT include any people, characters, figures, text, words, or greeting messages. NO TEXT AT ALL - only minimal decorative elements. in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds - Flat 2D artwork for printing
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing - IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated for QR code placement

generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
Create a right interior page where this message is the absolute star: "Happy Birthday to our two favorite people (who also happen to be our children)! We’re so glad we get to celebrate you both—it’s twice the fun and half the cleanup for us. We love you more than anything!

Love,
Mom and Dad". 

Use subtle style elements from the front design but keep decoration minimal (10-20% of page). Extract color hints from: "**Front Cover Prompt:**

A watercolor birthday greeting card front cover, funny and heartwarming, depicting a chaotic and joyful family celebration scene. In the center, "Happy Birthday Sarah & Mike!" is written in a beautiful, flowing, handwritten cursive script.

- EXACT TEXT REPRODUCTION: The message text must be reproduced EXACTLY as written - every word, punctuation mark, and character must be perfect
- PUT TEXT IN QUOTES: Always enclose the message text in double quotes to make it clear this is literal text to be rendered exactly
- CRYSTAL CLEAR LEGIBILITY: The handwriting must be extremely readable - prioritize clarity over artistic flourishes
- NO SPELLING ERRORS: Every word must be spelled correctly exactly as provided
- PROPER SPACING: Use appropriate letter spacing, word spacing, and line spacing for easy reading
- CONTRAST: Ensure high contrast between text and background for maximum readability
- SIZE: Make text large enough to read easily - avoid cramped or tiny text
- COMPLETE MESSAGE: Include the ENTIRE message text - do not truncate, abbreviate, or omit any part
- Use beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal
- Position the message text in the optimal location for readability (center area, avoid top/bottom 10%) 

Think premium stationery - mostly white space, perfect message placement, and just a touch of elegant decoration (corner details, small flourish, or soft wash). The message should dominate the visual hierarchy. NO PEOPLE, NO CHARACTERS, NO FIGURES. in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds - Flat 2D artwork for printing
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
